column2: Really lethargic and had ragged fur. No tumor present.
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen
Lots of small lung nodules-- looks like the beginning of the popcorn lung phenotype
No tumor chunks frozen or cell line attempted.
Colon appeared to be blocked or backed up.
Very little blood circulating through mouse.
